snippet: The attack on Bagram Air Base killed two service members and two contractors, American and Afghan officials said....

byline.original: By FAHIM ABED and ROD NORDLAND
byline.contributor: Fahim Abed reported from Kabul, and Rod Nordland from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: The attack on Bagram Air Base killed two service members and two contractors, American and Afghan officials said.

headline.main: Bomber Kills 4 Americans at U.S. Base in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Bomber Kills 4 Americans at Base in Afghanistan

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
